mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.status, m.sender, m.description, m.send_time, u.name AS userName, c.name AS className FROM class c LEFT JOIN USER u ON c.id=u.class_id LEFT JOIN message m ON m.sender=u.id WHERE m.receiver = #{id} and host_id = #{id} ORDER BY m.send_time DESC
